channel.title: Fixing an items smithing requirements?
channel.description:
I have tried to edit the required level to smith an item, but it doesn't work. On my server, the bronze dagger is most powerful :D... but anyone can make it! I need to fix it so it can't be made (or requires too many bars that nobody could ever get them, or change the level to something like 100000000 smithing required) How can i do this? I have looked through the tutorials, I can't find! Please, give me a link to a tutorial, or show me!
Thank you.

item.title: Fixing an items smithing requirements?
item.dc:creator: @Giovanni9104 Giovanni9104
item.description:
@Giovanni9104 wrote:

Very much appreciated! Changing the level didn’t work probably something i did wrong, so i just removed it from the list! Thank you very very much.

Read full topic
